titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the House from distributing campaign contributions in the Hall of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

bill.summary: 5/14/1996--Introduced. Amends rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the House from distributing campaign contributions in the Hall of the House of Representatives.
